attributes.action: permit a national referendum on the use of speed cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government and some motoring bodies suggest that there is wide support for speed cameras,  yet many unofficial polls suggest that the public strongly object to their use. 

There is no unequivocal evidence of the effectiveness of such cameras and harmful side effects have not been researched.  

In the absence of good research into their costs and benefits I call for a referendum on their use.
